TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlWriterTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 將追蹤或偵錯輸出做為 XML 編碼資料導向 或 ，例如做為 。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output as XML-encoded data to a or to a , such as a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 您必須具備 unmanaged 程式碼權限建立的執行個體類別。You must have unmanaged code permission to create an instance of the class. 類別會追蹤和偵錯資訊的 XML 編碼的文字資料流轉換成。The class converts tracing and debugging information into an XML-encoded text stream. 描述的 XML 輸出所示的資料表。The description of the XML output is shown in the tables that follow. 您可以使用[服務追蹤檢視器工具 (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129)以顯示 XML 輸出。You can use the [Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129) to display the XML output. 您可以啟用或停用透過應用程式組態檔，然後使用已設定的應用程式中。You can enable or disable an through the application configuration file and then use the configured in your application. 或者，您可以建立程式碼中。Alternately, you can create an in your code. 若要設定，編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To configure an , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此檔案中，可以新增或移除接聽程式、 設定接聽程式的屬性或移除接聽程式。In this file, you can add or remove a listener, set the properties for a listener, or remove listeners. 組態檔應該格式如下列範例所示。The configuration file should be formatted like the following example. ```xml ``` 類別會繼承從基底類別屬性。The class inherits the property from the base class . 屬性可讓一層額外的接聽程式在篩選的追蹤輸出。The property allows an additional level of trace output filtering at the listener. 如果沒有出現，篩選`Trace`追蹤接聽程式呼叫的方法方法來判斷是否要發出的追蹤篩選器。If there is a filter present, the `Trace` methods of the trace listener call the method of the filter to determine whether to emit the trace. > [!NOTE] > 如果嘗試寫入正在使用中的檔案，或無法使用，檔案名稱自動加上為 GUID。If an attempt is made to write to a file that is in use or unavailable, the file name is automatically prefixed by a GUID. > [!NOTE] > 接聽程式方法的目的是要呼叫的方法來， ，和類別。Listener methods are intended to be called by methods of the , , and classes. 接聽程式方法的目的不是直接從應用程式程式碼呼叫。The listener methods are not intended to be called directly from application code. 接聽程式主要是供類別。The listener is primarily intended for use by the class. 和方法可以呼叫和類別，以及預設值，可供 XML 項目，和不提供的值。The and methods can be called by the and classes, and default values are provided for the XML elements that and do not supply values for. 下表描述的元素和屬性的 XML 輸出。The following table describes the elements and attributes of the XML output. |元素Element|屬性Attributes|輸出Output|注意Notes| |-------------|----------------|------------|-----------| |`CallStack`|無None|取決於是否存在加上旗標屬性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|特殊字元，例如 > 或 < 逸出序列所取代。Special characters such as > or < are replaced with escape sequences. 請參閱逸出的字元轉譯表格所示。See the escaped character translation table that follows.| |`Computer`|無None|永遠存在。Always present.| 屬性的值。The value of the property.| |`Correlation`|`ActivityID`|永遠存在Always present|如果未指定，預設值是空的 GUID。If not specified, the default is an empty GUID.| ||`RelatedActivityID`|取決於是否存在`relatedActivityId`追蹤方法呼叫中的參數。Depends on the presence of the `relatedActivityId` parameter in the Trace method call.| 方法的 `relatedActivityId` 參數。The `relatedActivityId` parameter of the method.| |`DataItem`|無None|取決於`data`參數方法。Depends on the `data` parameter of the method.|這個項目可以包含在陣列的項目或一個項目，因此此值會寫入為一組`DataItem`下的節點`TraceData`項目。This element can contain an array of elements or one element, so the values are written as a set of `DataItem` nodes under the `TraceData` element.

資料輸出使用`ToString`傳入的資料物件的方法。The data output uses the `ToString` method of the passed-in data objects.| |`EventID`|無None|永遠存在。Always present.|參數的輸入 (`id`)。Parameter input (`id`).| |`Execution`|`ProcessName`|永遠存在。Always present.|從。From the .| ||`ProcessID`|永遠存在。Always present.|從。From the . 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 作業系統較高，如果`ProcessID`大於的 2147483647，它是負數值的正數表示法，並應該轉換成取得正確的處理序識別碼。On Windows 98 and Windows Me operating systems, if `ProcessID` is greater than 2,147,483,647 it is a positive representation of a negative number and should be converted to obtain the correct process identifier.| ||`ThreadID`|永遠存在。Always present.|從。From the .| |`Level`|無None|永遠存在。Always present.|參數的輸入 (數值`eventType`)。Parameter input (the numeric value of `eventType`). 大於 255 的參數值會輸出為 255。Parameter values greater than 255 are output as 255.| |`LogicalOperationStack`|無None|取決於是否存在加上旗標屬性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|可能有一個以上的邏輯作業，讓這些值會寫為`LogicalOperation`下的節點`LogicalOperationStack`項目。There can be more than one logical operation, so the values are written as `LogicalOperation` nodes under the `LogicalOperationStack` element.| |`Message`|無None|取決於存在的追蹤方法呼叫中的訊息。Depends on the presence of a message in the Trace method call.|如果格式化的引數提供，此元素為格式化的訊息。This element is a formatted message if formatting arguments are provided.| |`Source`|`Name`|永遠存在。Always present.|輸入的參數。Parameter input.| |`SubType`|`Name`|永遠存在。Always present.|輸入的參數。Parameter input.| |`TimeCreated`|`SystemTime`|永遠存在。Always present.|如果不存在於，預設值是目前的時間。If not present in the , the default is the current time.| |`TimeStamp`|無None|取決於是否存在加上旗標屬性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|從。From the .| |`Type`|無None|永遠存在。Always present.|永遠值 3。Always the value 3.| 下表會顯示 XML 輸出中逸出字元。The following table shows the characters that are escaped in the XML output. 逸出發生的所有項目和屬性除了`DataItem`項目，如果物件傳遞至未逸出`data`參數方法物件。Escaping occurs in all the elements and attributes with the exception of the `DataItem` element, which is not escaped if the object passed to the `data` parameter of the method is an object. 如果資料物件，用於方法呼叫，而且整個根節點會以未逸出的資料進行追蹤。If an is used for the data object, the method is called and the entire root node is traced as unescaped data. |逸出的字元Escaped character|值Value| |-----------------------|-----------| |&|&| |\<|<| |>|>| |""|"| |\|'| |0xD0xD|&\#xD;&\#xD;| |0xA0xA|&\#xA;&\#xA;| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別將逸出和非逸出的資料寫入至檔案記錄檔。The following code example shows the use of the class to write both escaped and non-escaped data to file logs. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener/VB/module1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的檔案做為偵錯和追蹤輸出的接收者，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified file as the recipient of the debugging and tracing output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別上指定的路徑、 指定的檔案使用編碼方式。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果檔案存在，就會附加至。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果檔案不存在，則會建立新的檔案。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要減少發生例外狀況的機會，可能會讓輸出的任何字元會取代"？"字元。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 屬性會初始化為空字串 ("")。The property is initialized to an empty string ("").

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, using the specified stream as the recipient of the debugging and tracing output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性`name`參數值或空字串 ("") 如果`name`參數是`null`。This constructor initializes the property to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 此名稱可以當做索引要以程式設計方式變更接聽程式的屬性集合。The name can be used as an index into the collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下列程式碼設定的執行個體屬性其屬性是 「 xmlListener"。For example, the following code sets the property for an instance of whose property is "xmlListener". ``` ((XmlWriterTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["xmlListener"]).TraceOutputOptions = TraceOptions.Timestamp ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別上指定的路徑、 指定的檔案使用編碼方式。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果檔案存在，就會附加至。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果檔案不存在，則會建立新的檔案。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要減少發生例外狀況的機會，可能會讓輸出的任何字元會取代"？"字元。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 屬性設定為`name`參數值或空字串 ("") 如果`name`參數是`null`。The property is set to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 此名稱可以當做索引要以程式設計方式變更接聽程式的屬性集合。The name can be used as an index into the collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下列程式碼設定的執行個體屬性其屬性是 「 xmlListener"。For example, the following code sets the property for an instance of whose property is "xmlListener". ``` ((XmlWriterTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["xmlListener"]).TraceOutputOptions = TraceOptions.Timestamp. ```

summary.span: 關閉這個接聽程式的 ，使其不再接收追蹤或偵錯輸出。

span.span: Closes the for this listener so that it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Fail (string message, string detailMessage);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Fail(string message, string detailMessage) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Fail (message As String, detailMessage As String)

span.span: The error message to write.

param.name: detailMessage
param.span: 要附加至錯誤訊息的詳細錯誤訊息。

span.span: The detailed error message to append to the error message.

summary.span: 寫入包括錯誤訊息的追蹤資訊，以及詳細的錯誤訊息至檔案或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information including an error message and a detailed error message to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設行為是以訊息以及詳細的訊息顯示在訊息方塊中，在使用者介面模式中，以及執行應用程式時中執行個體集合。The default behavior is to display the message and detailed message in a message box when the application is running in user-interface mode, and to the instances in the collection. 根據預設，集合包含的執行個體。By default, the collection contains an instance of . 您可以自訂此行為，透過加入或移除從集合。You can customize this behavior by adding or removing a from the collection.

summary.span: 將追蹤資料寫入輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace data to the output file or stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, object data);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceData(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, object data) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceData (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, data As Object)
public: override void TraceData(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, System::Object ^ data);

param.name: eventCache
param.span: ，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A data object to emit.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊，及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首及頁尾的追蹤中使用參數。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`參數就會轉換成不帶正負號的整數之前寫入，因此負數`id`值會寫為大型的正整數。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `data`參數會撰寫成`DataItem`節點`TraceData`項目。The `data` parameter is written as a `DataItem` node in the `TraceData` element. `ToString`資料物件的方法用來將物件轉換成字串。The `ToString` method of the data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 呼叫此方法的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

permission.span: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.

permission.span: 關聯的列舉型別：。

span.span: Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, params object[] data);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceData(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, object[] data) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceData (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, ParamArray data As Object())

public: override void TraceData(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, ... cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ data);

param.name: eventCache
param.span: ，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: data
param.span: 要發出的資料物件陣列。

span.span: An array of data objects to emit.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、資料物件，以及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, data objects, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首及頁尾的追蹤中使用參數。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`參數就會轉換成不帶正負號的整數之前寫入，因此負數`id`值會寫為大型的正整數。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 中的物件`data`參數陣列會寫入為`DataItem`中的節點`TraceData`項目。The objects in the `data` parameter array are written as `DataItem` nodes in the `TraceData` element. `ToString`的每個資料物件的方法用來將物件轉換成字串。The `ToString` method of each data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 呼叫此方法的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

permission.span: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.

permission.span: 關聯的列舉型別：。

span.span: Associated enumeration: .

summary.span: 將事件追蹤資訊寫入輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: Writes event trace information to the output file or stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceEvent (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, string message);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceEvent(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, string message) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceEvent (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, message As String)
public: override void TraceEvent(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, System::String ^ message);

param.name: eventCache
param.span: ，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.
The message to write.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、訊息，以及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, a message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首及頁尾的追蹤中使用參數。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`參數就會轉換成不帶正負號的整數之前寫入，因此負數`id`值會寫為大型的正整數。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message`參數會撰寫成`Message`項目。The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 呼叫此方法的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

permission.span: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.

permission.span: 關聯的列舉型別：。

span.span: Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceEvent (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, string format, params object[] args);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceEvent(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, string format, object[] args) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceEvent (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, format As String, ParamArray args As Object())

public: override void TraceEvent(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, System::String ^ format, ... cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ args);

param.name: eventCache
param.span: ，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: format
param.span: 包含零或多個格式項目的格式字串，這些項目與 args 陣列中的物件相對應。

span.span: A format string that contains zero or more format items that correspond to objects in the args array.

param.name: args
param.span: 物件陣列，包含零個或多個要格式化的物件。

span.span: An object array containing zero or more objects to format.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、格式化訊息，以及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首及頁尾的追蹤中使用參數。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`參數就會轉換成不帶正負號的整數之前寫入，因此負數`id`值會寫為大型的正整數。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 呼叫方法時，傳入`format`字串和`args`陣列做為參數，來格式化`args`物件陣列做為`Message`項目。The method is called, passing in the `format` string and `args` array as parameters, to format the `args` object array as the `Message` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 呼叫此方法的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceTransfer (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, int id, string message, Guid relatedActivityId);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceTransfer(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, int32 id, string message, valuetype System.Guid relatedActivityId) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceTransfer (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, id As Integer, message As String, relatedActivityId As Guid)
public: override void TraceTransfer(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, int id, System::String ^ message, Guid relatedActivityId);

param.name: eventCache
param.span: ，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A trace message to write.
A structure that identifies a related activity.

summary.span: 寫入包含相關活動之識別的追蹤資訊、訊息，以及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information including the identity of a related activity, a message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用於的相關的追蹤相互關聯。The method is used for the correlation of related traces. `eventCache`， `source`， `id`，和`relatedActivityId`頁首及頁尾的追蹤中使用參數。The `eventCache`, `source`, `id`, and `relatedActivityId` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`參數就會轉換成不帶正負號的整數之前寫入，因此負數`id`值會寫為大型的正整數。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message`參數會撰寫成`Message`項目。The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element. 方法呼叫以將轉換`relatedActivityId`"B"的值格式化字串，它會出現在標頭。The method is called to convert the `relatedActivityId`value to a "B" formatted string, which appears in the header. `SubTypeName`在頁尾中的項目會識別為追蹤事件類型。The `SubTypeName` element in the footer identifies the trace event type as a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 它是由呼叫發出的追蹤資訊的物件及其方法。It is intended to be called by a object to emit the trace information for its method.

permission.span: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.

permission.span: 關聯的列舉型別：。

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Write (string message);

span.span: The message to write.

summary.span: 寫入逐字規範訊息至檔案或資料流，不加任何其他內容資訊。

span.span: Writes a verbatim message without any additional context information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將記錄輸出中包含的內容資訊。Use the method to include context information in the log output.

summary.span: 寫入逐字規範訊息至檔案或資料流，不加任何其他內容資訊，後面附上目前的行結束字元。

span.span: Writes a verbatim message without any additional context information followed by the current line terminator to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將記錄輸出中包含的內容資訊。Use the method to include context information in the log output.
